abilityPool.description: Time presses down on all foes, slowing their movements.

abilityPool.description: A crushing magical blow delivered in response to mortal insolence.

abilityPool.description: Ptah anchors himself, becoming a living statue for a short time.

abilityPool.name: Sands of Judgment
abilityPool.description: Shifting sand lashes out and grinds away at an enemy’s resolve.

abilities.name: Restorative Light
abilities.description: A gentle radiance that mends an ally’s wounds.

abilities.name: Blessing of Ptah
abilities.description: A ritual blessing that empowers both physical and magical strikes.

abilities.name: Judicial Radiance
abilities.description: Holy light washes over enemies, briefly dulling their strikes.
